CHAT.comment: PLEASANT GROVE CITY, UTAH, ET AL., Petitioners v. SUMMUM.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:13 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JAY A. SEKULOW ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DARYL JOSEFFER ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PAMELA HARRIS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JAY A. SEKULOW ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:14 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
